text: For custom modules does there happen to be a way to tap into the HubSpot Padding toggle to use those settings within the custom module?
Hey Alyssa, you would want to use style fields: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/module-theme-fields-overview#style-fields>

I don't think drag and drop email can use style tabs. I tried. Also, there's a padding toggle added to the bottom of every module, even the custom ones. Adding my own padding options is confusing to the user.

Oh, my bad, I didnt see this was the email channel :faceplam: I do not think this is available in email at the moment. I will loop in with some folks internally and see what i can find out. Iâ€™m apologize for my confusion on this.
Haha no worries. Lookin forward to hearing back.
It would be useful if they just let us choose an HTML template and let us drag whatever we want into `{% block modules %}{% endblock %}`
